description.en:
DMScript is a blockchain-gaming company dedicated to backing and releasing video game-related projects, utilizing the blockchain technology that has also proven to be unshakable in times of crisis.

They’re utilizing their DMST tokens as a way for users of any of DMScript’s projects to enjoy premium features only accessible via using the token instead of FIAT currencies. Users will have the liberty to switch currencies whenever they desire using any of our projects with ease.
